#include <stdio.h>

int main () {
  int test_cases;
  scanf ("%d", &test_cases);
  while (test_cases--) {
    int code_hint;
    scanf ("%d", &code_hint);
    int sum_digits = 0;
    int temp = code_hint;
    while (temp != 0) {
      sum_digits += (temp % 10);
      temp /= 10;
    }
    printf ("%d\n", code_hint % sum_digits);
  }
}
